name: Zealot Commando
description:
Zealot Commando is a tactical stealth game.
Take control of a team of deadly specialists and sneak between helpless marines. You'll need to carefully choose your approach to infiltrate heavily defended bases and outposts. Being spotted means death.

This game is a recreation of a Starcraft 2 Arcade map of the same name.

Game resolution and Windowed Mode are fixed and cannot be changed.
It is recommended to download and play the offline version.

CHANGE LOG:
